data.title: Worldwide semiconductor revenue is forecast to grow by 14% in 2025
data.description: Global semiconductor revenue is projected to grow 14% in 2025 to a total of $717 billion, according to the latest forecast from Gartner, Inc. In 2024, the market is forecast to grow 19% and reach $630 billion.

data.title: Thailand's October exports reach $27.22bn, highest in 19 months
data.description: Imports amount to $28.02 billion, up 15.9%, resulting in trade deficit of $794.4 million

data.title: DSI asks court to approve temporary detention of Samart, mother

data.description: OAG will set up a panel to study the 14 reports on murder and attempted murder before presenting them in court to press more charges on ‘cyanide killer’ Sararat

data.title: Adrenal Fatigue: Understanding symptoms and holistic recovery
data.description: Are you constantly exhausted, even after a full night’s sleep? Do energy slumps and cravings for sugar or salt dominate your day? These could be warning signs of adrenal fatigue—a condition where your adrenal glands struggle to function effectively, disrupting your body’s natural rhythms and leaving you drained. Far from being just another form of tiredness, adrenal fatigue impacts your hormones, metabolism, and overall well-being. The good news? Understanding and addressing this hidden imbalance can be the key to reclaiming your energy and vitality.

data.title: Thailand, Iran mark 70 years of diplomatic ties in Ayutthaya

data.title: Evolving HER2-positive breast cancer treatment to improve survival rate
data.description: Treatment for human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2)-positive breast cancer continues to evolve, resulting in improved survival and enhancing the quality of life for patients, medical experts said.

data.title: Unemployment rises by 1.02% in third quarter

data.title: Technologies and approaches developed to tackle colorectal cancer
data.description: Surgery for colorectal cancer has been developed over time to improve the outcome, medical experts said during an academic meeting hosted by the Bangkok Dusit Medical Services (BDMS).
